```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(grid)
library(gridExtra)

# Function to draw a triangle
draw_triangle <- function(x, y, size) {
  grid.polygon(
    x = unit(c(x, x + size, x + size/2), "npc"),
    y = unit(c(y, y, y + size * sqrt(3)/2), "npc"),
    gp = gpar(fill = "blue")
  )
}

# Function to draw a row of triangles
draw_row <- function(row_num, triangle_size) {
  num_triangles = row_num * 2 - 1
  y_offset = row_num * triangle_size * sqrt(3)/2
  for (i in seq(1, num_triangles)) {
    x_offset = (i - (num_triangles + 1) / 2) * triangle_size
    draw_triangle(0.5 + x_offset, y_offset, triangle_size)
  }
}

# Define the size of each triangle and the number of rows
triangle_size = 0.05
num_rows = 10

# Draw all rows of triangles
for (row_num in seq(1, num_rows)) {
  draw_row(row_num, triangle_size)
}
```
